name: Hard Drive Project
description:
Enter the century of speed in this fast-paced, intense retro-futuristic arcade racing game!

Drift your way through twisted roads, wallrides and loops. Hit booster pads as you drive towards the finish line as fast as possible.

Drifting gives you speed - boost pads give you speed - crashing overcharges your thrusters!

Hard Drive Project is a time-attack arcade racer created in Unreal Engine. There are three levels to beat, each one rewarding you with a trophy. This is a hobby project, meant to be a proof-of-concept and a fragment of my vision of a retro-futuristic arcade racing game.

This is the first game project I release, and I hope you will enjoy it as much as I had fun working on it, with all the good and bad things :) Don't be scared if you find any bugs!

And remember: Drifting makes you faster!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - KEYBOARD

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Drive - [Arrow Keys]

Drift - [Left Ctrl] / [Right Ctrl]

Emergency Boost - [Shift]

Camera Change - [C]

Respawn - [Enter]

Restart Level - [Delete]

Pause - [Esc] / [P]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls - GAMEPAD

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Accelerate  - Right Trigger

Brake - Left Trigger

Steer - Left Stick

Drift - Right Stick Down / X

Emergency Boost - Right Stick Up / [LB]

Camera Change - [RB] 

Respawn - [Y]

Restart Level - [B]

Pause - [Back]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changing resolution is a bit bugged. To change resolution: Enter windowed mode, select your resolution, then go back on fullscreen.

Thank you for your attention! Enjoy! :)

-DroidekaMkII
